s.text: Using an Advantage-GC cDNA PCR polymerase (Clontech) and Pfu DNA polymerase (Stratagene), PCR was carried out with primers specific to the exon and/or intron of DMN sequence (Table 1) under the following conditions: 94¡C for 1 min followed by 35 cycles of 94¡C for 1 min, 57-59 ¡C for 1 min, 72¡C for 3 min and a final extension time of 10 min at 72¡C.
